title: Want To Buy:  Want to your semi or bolt .22 cal
location: North West Nashua, Nashua, New Hampshire
postcontent:
As the title states, I want to buy your .22 Cal rifle in semi, or bolt action.

My wife would like to learn to shoot, so I am in need of a GOOD .22 rifle.  Doesn't need to be "tacticool", in fact I would prefer a basic model.  I am willing to consider an AR based .22, as I have the .308 version.

Please note, I am lookking for one at a REALISTIC price.  If the rifle you have sells for 200.00 new, than I am not going to give you 200.00 for a USED rifle.  This also means that if your rifle costs 180.00 new, I am not going to pay more than that for a used one.

However, there is a catch (isn't there always?).  I AM willing to meet face to face ONLY, and purchase your file with cash.  But the catch is, you MUST know what you are selling, and what it is REALLY worth.  

For example, if you have a Ruger 10/22 Tactical with collapsing and folding stock (model number 1113), know that if I REALLY wanted a NEW one, I could buy it for under four hundred.  This means that your USED one is NOT worth more than the cost of a new one.  It's that simple.  People come here to make deals on firearms, not pay more than retail.

If you have a Mossberg Tactical .22 (the AR clone), know that they can be purchased NEW for 243.00.   This means your USED one is NOT worth four hundred.

I am willing to pay a reasonable price, no questions asked.  HOWEVER, if I can buy a NEW one for less than you are asking for a USED one, it is not worth my time, because you clearly dont grasp that once a firearm is used, it looses value.  Whether you have fired twenty rounds, or two hundred rounds through it, it is still a used rifle.  I will give you more than a gun shop will, simply because I am an end user, and not out to resell any firearms.

For example, you crazy people charging FIVE HUNDRED for a "tactical" SKS.... you know you can pick them up at Shooters Outpost in Hooksett for under two hundred dollars, right?  I believe I paid $175.00 for my SKS there last week

title: For Sale:  Price Reduced - U.S. Rifle, Caliber .30, Model of 1917, aka M1917 Enfield, aka P17
postcontent:
Cleaning out of gun safe continues.  For sale is my U.S. Rifle, Caliber .30, Model of 1917. Also known as M1917 Enfield and the P17. It was restored by Miltech Arms.  Visit Miltech’s website (www.miltecharms.com) for full details. 

The receiver was manufactured in December 1918 by Remington's subsidiary, Eddystone, in Pennsylvania.  The barrel and stock are new from the restoration process.  Only about 100 rounds have been thru it.  It is an excellent rifle for CMP vintage shoots.  Comes with pine wood shipping case, cloth case, manual, leather sling, and cleaning accessories. 

A fun fact is more Model of 1917 rifles were issued to Doughboys in WWI than any other rifle.  

Price is $950 OBO.  Price from Miltech is $1,775.  FTF, cash only.  Must be 18+, Ohio resident, and legally allowed to own a gun.  CCL preferred.  Not interested in trades.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Beretta Tomcat .32 ACP
postcontent:
The 3032 Tomcat offers all the features of the 21 Bobcat. Both pistols have a snag-proof design that permits quick presentation to the target, a slide blade front sight for fast target acquisition, and a smooth, crisp trigger pull in double/single action.

QUALITY POCKET PISTOLS. 
The same dedication to advanced design, uncompromising quality and strict quality control that make the 92FS, Cougar and Cheetah such international standouts is found in all Beretta small caliber, pocket-size pistols. Simplicity, safety and practical use are their best qualities. 
PRACTICAL AND SIMPLE.
The exclusive tip-up barrel allows the user to easily load a round directly into the chamber. It also assists in the safe clearing of the pistol by allowing a live round to be easily removed from the chamber and the bore quickly checked. Jamming and stovepiping problems are virtually eliminated by the open slide design shared by all small frame Berettas. 
Stopping power, concealability and lightweight – that’s what the double-action Tomcat is all about. Using 60-grain .32 ACP (7.65 mm) hollow-point ammunition, this latest addition to Beretta’s small frame collection provides firepower equalling the punch of a .380 (9mm Short). Yet, all this serious capability is packed into a compact, lightweight 4.9” (125 mm), 14.5 ounce (400 gr.) package. A drift-adjustable rear sight provides for superior accuracy. Available in the Tritium version featuring the tritium luminous front sight in some countries. 
Comes with 1 magazine and some rounds, pocket holster and original plastic hard case. Less than 50 rds shot through it. Good backup gun and nice for pocket carry.

title: For Sale:  Beretta Px4 Storm Compact - 9mm
postcontent:
I'm selling this firearm used, with about 300-400 rounds through the system.
I've yet to experience any failures (to feed, eject or extract), and I've thoroughly cleaned the system after each firing. I've even taken the time to clean out the magazines recently.

The reason I'm selling the Px4 is because I'm finally realizing that, although this is a compact firearm, it's still a little too large for someone my size. With that said, I'm keeping my BU9 Nano as my primary carry firearm.

This firearm comes with a leather holster custom made by Gaunt Leather (https://www.facebook.com/pages/Gaunt-Leather-Co/REDACTED17) if you so choose to purchase it with the firearm. This holster is an IWB holster and holds the Px4 perfectly and firmly.

What is in the pictures, is what is for sale. The holster is negotiable, and we can discuss the price of said item later.
---
---
The Px4 Compact offers a full grip for most shooters, and two extra back-straps, providing incredible controllability in an easy to carry package.The 16 round capacity (15+1 in 9mm) provides for true combat effectiveness, while still remaining compact. Equipped with an accessory rail, new ambidextrous slide stop and new integral/retractable lanyard loop, the Px4 Compact is highly flexible and mission ready. 

With a cold hammer forged barrel, for precision and the Px4 family’s rotary barrel system to reduce recoil for faster follow up shots, the Compact is fast and accurate. Technology, precision, and a smaller profile make the Px4 Compact the ultimate in concealable, duty ready pistols.

title: For Sale:  Arsenal of Bulgaria Sam7SF milled side folder FS
postcontent: Just like the title says.  I have an Arsenal of Bulgaria Sam7SF rifle chambered in 7.62x39.  This is a pretty rare rifle with only 400 being imported roughly 6-7 years ago.  Reason being it is a milled receiver with a factory Bulgarian side folding stock that is currently being used/produced by Bulgaria for it's military and other armed forces around the world.  The military platform designation is known as the AR-M9F.  Great condition with only a few hundred rounds fired through the rifle.  By far one of the smoothest and most accurate 7.62x39 AK platform rifles I have ever owned/fired.  Rifle also has a factory side optics rail, rear receiver mounted sling swivel, a threaded 24mm fsb, ambidextrous galil style safety and cleaning rod.  This rifle hasn't been nuteured for import like many of the sam7 series have been.  Great condition with only a few small light marks here and there from inserting mags, and removing/replacing the cleaning rod.  Need to sell to help pay tuition for grad school.  Asking $1500 OBO.  That is less than what I paid for it, and I have seen several in the past few weeks selling on gunbroker for between $2k and $2400.  Not really looking for too many trades.  Maybe a partial trade towards an  XDS9, XDS45, Ruger 1911, Mosin nagant+ammo, BCM upper, or possibly a square back vepr.  Willing to ship or meet ftf near College Station.

SKU #: CSR-1516 Colt-Branded improved M4-carbine style 6-position adjustable stock with two sling-swivel attachment hard-points. Suitable ammunition: factory-loaded SAAMI-Spec .223 ammo and NATO-stamped 5.56x45mm ammo with 50 to 77 grain bullets. Gas-operated, original direct-impingement system. One 30 round polymer magazine included. Upper receiver: flat-top forged 7075-T6 alloy with 13-slot picatinny rail. Lower receiver: forged 7075-T6 alloy with integrally-forged over-size trigger guard. Colt-Branded standard charging handle. Colt Match-Target Trigger nickel-teflon coated, breaks at 6 pounds. Colt-Brand bolt and bolt carrier with standard buffer. Colt-Branded flash supressor/muzzle brake, barrel threaded: 1/2 inch diameter-28 TPI. Colt-Branded match-grade barrel, 4140 chrome-moly steel, black-nitrided bore, chamber and exterior with 60-degree button-rifling, 6-groove, 1 turn in 8 inches, right hand twist. .223 Wylde match chamber. Carbine-length gas block location. Colt forged-steel low-profile gas block. Colt-Branded over-molded finger-groove grip with integral beavertail. Colt 12 inch modular float-tube handguard. One 3 inch/5-slot picatinny rail at 12 o'clock position. A few AR15 manufacturers incorporate the use of a hybrid chamber specification known as the Wylde chamber. Designed by and named after Bill Wylde, the Wylde chamber was designed to accurately shoot the military ball ammo of the day while still feeding reliably. Coincidentally, it shoots the longer 80 gr bullets commonly used in the sport of Highpower Rifle Competition very well and is one of the preferred chambers for that use. While the Wylde chamber allows for optimal seating depth of 80 grain bullets over .223 Remington and 5.56 NATO, it is capable of accepting both ammunition types. The Wylde chamber is used by a few manufacturers who sell "National Match" configuration AR-15 rifle At this time we only accept checks and money orders

Many operators preffer this system to even the HK 416 for its simple one piece fail safe piston, and its unmatched reliability.  No short cuts in this build!   

SPECS INCLUDE...

SPIKES TACTICAL PISTON UPPER W/ UPGRADED CHROME BOLT , MELONITE  BARREL SPIKE 1'' GUARANTY ON THE BARREL. PLUS HEAVY DUTY EXTRACTOR!

MAG PULL BACK UP SIGHTS.

IME SURE I AM LEAVING THINGS OUT BUT YOU GET THE GIST... BEST OF THE BEST!

A TRUE NO B.S. SYSTEM...
2750 w/ Acog and case 1800 w/o ( GUN ONLY ) Obo?



Below are the specific details of the Spike’s Tactical 16” Dedicated Piston Upper Receiver Assembly.


T2 Buffer 

- Weight: 4.3oz. (Depending on the density and size of the HDTP, weight can vary slightly.)
- CNC machined from Solid Billet Aluminum Bar Stock.
- Anodized Matte Black/Laser engraved with the trademark Spike’s Tactical Spider Logo.
- Filled with HDTP (High Density Tungsten Powder) makes for a very smooth cycling rifle. 
- Eliminates the chance of bolt bounce and muzzle rise in full-auto. 
- Cuts down on felt recoil.

Piston Upper Receiver 

- Mil-Spec M4 flat top upper receivers designed and manufactured solely for use with the Spike’s Tactical piston system. 
- Operating rod guide hole in the face of the upper receiver, is designed to the proper diameter eliminating the need of an additional steel bushing. 
- M4 feed ramps standard.
- Standard rail T-Markings for repeat indexing of optic mounts.
- Mil-Spec Type III hard coat anodized.
- Mil-Spec forged billet charging handle. 
- Engraved with the trademark Spike’s Tactical Spider logo. 

Barrel 

- Manufactured from Match Quality stainless steel barrel blanks.
- Mid-length gas system.
- 16” length. Lightweight government profile.
- 1/8 twist rate. 
- Chambered for 5.56mm NATO. 
- Come standard with M4 ramped barrel extension. 
- A2 Flash Hider.
- Threaded to accept standard 1/2x28 flash suppressors or muzzle breaks. 
- Melonite coated inside and out for corrosion resistance and durability. 

Piston Block 

- Manufactured from High Quality stainless steel. 
- Low profile design, pinned to the barrel using (2) 1/8 hardened straight pins. 
- Gas pressure adjustable through the use of a spring assisted plunger. 
- 3 gas settings for: - Full Gas - Suppressed - No Gas (single shot).
- Melonite coated inside and out. 
- Engraved with the trademark Spike’s Tactical Spider logo. 


Piston Plug and Op Rod 

- Piston plug and op rod manufactured from High Quality stainless steel.
- Coated inside and out with Melonite.
- Requires no tools for disassembly. 
- System can be broke down from the front of the Piston Block for maintenance/cleaning. 

Carrier 

- Bolt carriers are machined as a one piece design.
- Machined with an enlarged diameter and chamfered end, the carrier has machined in “skis” to help prevent carrier tilt and drag. 
- Melonite coated inside and out for corrosion resistance and durability. 
- Engraved with the trademark Spike’s Tactical Spider logo. 

Bolt 

- Spring loaded design.
- Mil-Spec, shot peened, MP marked and tested. 
- Extractor spring comes standard with black insert and Viton o-ring. 

Rail System- Free-float Daniel Defense Lite Rail 9.0 

The Daniel Defense AR15 Lite Rail 9.0 (Midlength) utilizes the Patent Pending Bolt Up System™. This innovative system gives the weapon system an uninterrupted upper rail platform and also allows the Armorer to install the rail system with simplified alignment to the upper receiver. Not only does this battle proven system provide features that no other rail system on the market possesses, but it is also the lightest rail system available.

The 9.0 Free Float Picatinny Handguard was designed to work with mid length AR15 gas systems and its exceptionally light weight makes it perfect for short rifles where size and weight are crucial performance attributes.

Precision CNC machined from Aircraft Grade 6061-T6 Aluminum and Military Specification Type III Hard Coat Anodized for a rock hard lasting finish while weighing in at a mere 11 ozs. The AR15 Lite Rail 9.0 Barrel Nut is constructed from hardened steel and then Military Specification Heavy Phosphate coated.

- Aircraft Grade 6061-T6 Aluminum 
- Military Specification Type III Hard Coat Anodized 
- Weighs only 11 ozs! 
- Made in the USA!

postcontent: COLT COMPETITION RIFLES - Sporting Rifle .223 Remington/5.56x45mm - 16 Inch Barrel - M4-Carbine Style 6-Position Adjustable Stock - Black - 30 Round Magazine. SKU #: CSR-1516 Colt-Branded improved M4-carbine style 6-position adjustable stock with two sling-swivel attachment hard-points. Suitable ammunition: factory-loaded SAAMI-Spec .223 ammo and NATO-stamped 5.56x45mm ammo with 50 to 77 grain bullets. Gas-operated, original direct-impingement system. One 30 round polymer magazine included. Upper receiver: flat-top forged 7075-T6 alloy with 13-slot picatinny rail. Lower receiver: forged 7075-T6 alloy with integrally-forged over-size trigger guard. Colt-Branded standard charging handle. Colt Match-Target Trigger nickel-teflon coated, breaks at 6 pounds. Colt-Brand bolt and bolt carrier with standard buffer. Colt-Branded flash supressor/muzzle brake, barrel threaded: 1/2 inch diameter-28 TPI. Colt-Branded match-grade barrel, 4140 chrome-moly steel, black-nitrided bore, chamber and exterior with 60-degree button-rifling, 6-groove, 1 turn in 8 inches, right hand twist. .223 Wylde match chamber. Carbine-length gas block location. Colt forged-steel low-profile gas block. Colt-Branded over-molded finger-groove grip with integral beavertail. Colt 12 inch modular float-tube handguard. One 3 inch/5-slot picatinny rail at 12 o'clock position. A few AR15 manufacturers incorporate the use of a hybrid chamber specification known as the Wylde chamber. Designed by and named after Bill Wylde, the Wylde chamber was designed to accurately shoot the military ball ammo of the day while still feeding reliably. Coincidentally, it shoots the longer 80 gr bullets commonly used in the sport of Highpower Rifle Competition very well and is one of the preferred chambers for that use. While the Wylde chamber allows for optimal seating depth of 80 grain bullets over .223 Remington and 5.56 NATO, it is capable of accepting both ammunition types. The Wylde chamber is used by a few manufacturers who sell "National Match" configuration AR-15 rifle At this time we only accept checks and money orders
